      • setBlockIncrement

        public final void setBlockIncrement(double blockIncrement)
        The amount to increment for block increments of the range extents. A block increment is equivalent to using the pgUp and pgDown keys to move the slider thumbs.
        Parameters:
        blockIncrement -
